title: Santos Cosme e Damião (Capela dos)
body: With this invocation, there used to be, but has long since disappeared, a chapel in the area of Salão, in the parish of Calheta, which was founded in 1681 by the surgeon Antonio de França Gomes.

Salão: Location where the chapel of Santos Cosme e Damião used to exist.

Antonio de França Gomes: Surgeon and founder of the chapel.
